subject: Re: dependant TestCases
msgSnippet: ... It s not good practice to have tests dependent on each other.  I suggest you add code to TestCase #2 to retrieve the results you need so you have something
messageBody:
> I would like to do the following
> - Run a TestCase #1
> - Get the result from TestCase #1
> - Run TestCase #2 using the result of TestCase #1

It's not good practice to have tests dependent on each other. I suggest you
add code to TestCase #2 to retrieve the results you need so you have
something like this:

test1() {
Result1 result = getStuff();
checkResult1(result);
}

test2() {
Result1 result1 = getStuff();
Result2 result2 = getOtherStuff(result1);
checkResult2(result2);
}

Mike
